job_history.work_description: Develops Human Resources policies, procedures, plans and budgets. The safety of the workforce for recruitment, development and compensation of a superior workforce. Develops an employee-oriented culture that emphasizes quality, continuous improvement and high performance.
Administered various HR plans and procedures for all company personnel; assist in development and implementation of personnel policies and procedures; Ensure employee compliance.
Developed, implemented and coordinated policies and procedures for all Human Resources functions such as recruiting, wage/salary administration and health programs.
Conducted background checks on candidates by obtaining information from law enforcement officials, previous employers and references.

skills.name: Human Resource Management
skills.explanation: Over a decade of experience in various HR roles, including HR Generalist and Human Resource Manager, with a strong educational background in Human Resource Management, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Recruitment
skills.explanation: Extensive experience in recruitment, including conducting background checks and developing employee-oriented cultures, suggesting strong proficiency.

skills.name: Employee Development
skills.explanation: Consistently involved in employee development, including compensation and benefits, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.name: Policy Development
skills.explanation: Developed and implemented various HR policies and procedures, suggesting strong proficiency in policy development.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Managed HR functions and teams, indicating a solid level of proficiency in leadership.

skills.name: Compliance
skills.explanation: Ensured employee compliance with HR policies and procedures, showing a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Employee Relations
skills.explanation: Developed and maintained employee-oriented cultures, indicating a solid working proficiency in employee relations.
